settings.title: Vintage Chalky Finish
settings.text: Achieve a timeless vintage look with the paint's charming chalky matte finish, adding character to your floors.

settings.title: Direct Application
settings.text: Formulated for direct application onto bare or painted wooden or concrete floors, eliminating the need for extensive preparation.

settings.title: Versatile Compatibility
settings.text: Suitable for use on both wooden and concrete floors, providing flexibility in your floor decorating projects.

settings.title: Easy to Work With
settings.text: Enjoy effortless application as the paint is easy to work with, requiring minimal preparation for a hassle-free experience.

settings.title: Low VOC and Odourless
settings.text: Crafted with a water-based formula boasting a low VOC level and virtually no odour, creating a more pleasant painting environment.

settings.title: Timeless Charm
settings.text: Infuse your floors with timeless elegance, thanks to the paint's vintage chalky matte finish that enhances their aesthetic appeal.

settings.title: Effortless Application
settings.text: Save time and effort with direct application onto wooden or concrete floors, reducing the need for extensive preparation.

settings.title: Healthier Indoor Environment
settings.text: Choose a paint with low VOC levels and virtually no odour, promoting a healthier indoor environment for you and your family.

settings.title: Long-lasting Results
settings.text: Benefit from durable coverage that withstands everyday wear and tear, ensuring long-lasting beauty for your floors.

settings.heading: Additives
settings.text: Engineered with state-of-the-art additives, our paints are designed to elevate your painting experience to new heights. From enhanced adhesion to resistance against the elements, our formulations are built to withstand the test of time, delivering flawless results with every application.

settings.text: Immerse yourself in a palette of premium pigments, meticulously crafted to ignite your imagination and transform any space. Experience the allure of vibrant hues and rich tones, as our paints breathe life into your surroundings with unparalleled beauty.

settings.text: Evelyn Grant is synonymous with luxury in paint, delivering an exquisite finish without the luxury price tag. Our materials are chosen for their superior quality and ability to provide an upscale finish that's accessible to all.

settings.heading: How Evelyn Grant Chalk Floor Paint Works
PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray
